workflows.title: ToxRAP
workflows.description: Retrieval-augmented agent for evidence-backed chemical toxicity assessment.

workflows.title: ToxDirect
workflows.description: Direct OpenAI LLM answer (no schema, no retrieval).

workflows.title: ToxJson
workflows.description: OpenAI LLM answer formatted as JSON schema.

workflows.title: orchestrate
workflows.description: Combines insights from prediction, metabolism and pathway analysis to provide a comprehensive toxicological assessment of chemical compounds.
workflows.initial_prompt: what chemical are you interested in?
